name: Habanero Guacamole
author: kristinamarie
summary: A spicy creamy goodness that goes great on sandwiches, burgers, or tortilla chips! Easy and fast to whip up for the family. This guacamole can be very spicy. When dealing with peppers high on the Scoville scale, PLEASE ALWAYS WEAR gloves to protect yourself and others! Wash your cutting surfaces thoroughly!
ingredients: 2  habanero peppers, seeded and minced (wear gloves), or to taste
4 sprigs cilantro, chopped, or to taste
½ large tomato, seeded and finely diced
directions: Blend avocados, red onion, habanero peppers, garlic, lime juice, cayenne pepper, and cilantro in a food processor until smooth; transfer to a bowl
Fold tomato into the avocado mixture
